about_the_game:
Play as bodybuilder Flex Hamstring, date beautiful babes, and avoid dangerous, seductive androids in this hilarious vaporwave love letter to the dating sim genre!

Sperm donor Flex Hamstring, a totally organic man in a world of robotic amputees, is being hunted for his... product. The evil CEO Richard Spunk has created 2 devastatingly beautiful android women to steal his livelihood- which is exactly when THREE beautiful women come into Flex's life. Only one of them can be human, and it's up to Flex to determine which beautiful babe it could be!

Is it the sexy, matronly maid Anika?



The energetic gym bunny Mina?



Or the mysterious and seductive selkie KIMBOT 3000?



Created by documented freakshow Wilson Taylor (Dreamcutter, Inverse Ninjas, Animal Lover) and Meadowlurking (Dreamcutter, Con-Quest, @meadowlurking on 𝕏) and featuring a soundtrack by living vaporwave legend MAITRO (Dragon Ball Wave)! Increase your stats, experience a raunchy, incendiary comedy, find love, and experience the sexed-up, dangerous lifestyle of Flex Hamstring - Bodybuilder!

content_descriptors.notes: This is a raunchy game. Exceptionally raunchy. The raunchiness, not unlike American Pie or Orgasmo, is a foundational part of the premise and experience. It's also all in good fun. No sexual violence, nothing disturbing and graphic to the point of shock.

name: Bodybuilder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Three beautiful women! But two of them are secretly androids! Play as himbo Flex Hamstring, choose between Anika, Mina, and KIMBOT 3000, and avoid the machinations of the evil Richard Spunk in this hilarious love letter to classic PC dating sims!
